name: Bitcoin Hivemind
body:
### Don't Get Fooled Again
HiveMind is a Peer-to-Peer Oracle Protocol which absorbs accurate data into a blockchain so that Bitcoin-users can speculate in Prediction Markets. These markets have the potential to revolutionize the emergence and diffusion of society's knowledge.

* What is Hivemind? (10 fun slides) 
* What makes Hivemind different?

### Endorsements

* Roger Ver
* Peter Todd
* Andrew Poelstra

### The Goal: Scientific Revolution Part II
Speaking technically, this project aims to get **external data** into a blockchain reliably, and use that data **efficiently** and **conservatively**.

However, unlike other blockchain-projects, the ultimate purpose is NOT to establish a new payment system (nor to delude the innocent with get-rich-quick nonsense), but instead to...

...revolutionize [the way information is created and spread](http://www.truthcoin.info/presentations/info-problems.pdf), giving the internet a "frontal lobe"...
...overhaul [democratic governance](http://mason.gmu.edu/~rhanson/futarchy.html) (highlighting the irrelevance of showmanship/PR/race/gender/who-candidate-has-slept-with)...
...[boost economic growth](http://www.overcomingbias.com/2014/04/rah-manic-monopolists.html)...
...cut out all Wall St. / banking middlemen and replace them with [tech](http://mason.gmu.edu/~rhanson/mktscore.pdf)...
...spearhead the campaign to make Bitcoin the world's internet currency...
...and [more](http://www.truthcoin.info/papers/3_PM_Applications.pdf)!
